妥協.definition: to compromise; to reach terms; a compromise

妥妥的.definition: (neologism c. 2009) don't worry, it's all taken care of

妥帖.definition: properly; satisfactorily; firmly; very fitting; appropriate; proper; to be in good order; also written 妥貼|妥贴[tuo3 tie1]

妥貼.definition: properly; satisfactorily; firmly; very fitting; appropriate; proper; to be in good order; also written 妥帖
